short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listify enables you to write down all your tasks at one place and organise them.It makes you self aware and boosts your productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listify is a revolutionary chrome extension which acts as your personal task manager.You can use it to remember some simple things such as "Drink water" or "Send an email to a friend".
The options page in lisify enables you to manage all your tasks.you can remove them or just complete them.Add all the tasks which you want to remember or keep track of their dead line, to the calendar.
Unlike other chrome extensions Listify needs to interact with it frequently so that you become self aware about your tasks and improves your daily productivity.
